quote_a: Being interviewed by an AI is different in that, I think with a human, there’s more relationship, more reciprocity, and more of a conversation. There’s a greater back and forth. With an AI, there’s none of that, so it relies on me to carry the conversation.
quote_b: the AI was able to pick up on things that I had said and ask a follow-up question about that with a specific follow-up rather than just a generic "tell me more about why you gave the answer you did" type of question.
explanation: The participant first claims AI provides no back-and-forth and relies on them to carry the conversation, then contradicts this by crediting the AI for picking up on their answers and asking specific follow-up questions.
